sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 20 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Practice the skill at least once before session.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### Skill focus
- Skill: self-soothing

### Practice steps
1. Pick one soothing sight or sound.
2. Add a calming texture or scent.
3. Stay with the sensation for 2 minutes.

### Try it in a real moment
- When will I practice? ______
- Where? ______
- What might get in the way? ______
- What will help? ______

### Reflection
- What did I notice? ______
- What helped most? ______

sections.title: Clinician notes
sections.markdown:
- Draft-only, clinician review required.
- Invite the client to share highlights in session and reinforce skill use.
- Reinforce any use of the skill, even brief attempts.
- Emphasize choice points and self-validation.
